message.content:
{"id": "18705", "title": "Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example", 
"description": "When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, I noticed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.", 
"OB": "Currently, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames are being repainted entirely when resizing the window in the vertical direction. ", 
"EB": "Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted when resizing the window in the vertical direction. This will reduce the flashing issue.", 
"SR": "To reproduce the bug:\n1. Run the control example\n2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only\n3. Notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '18705', 'title': 'Bug 18705Too much flashin in Control Example', 'description': 'why? ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'only the bottom edge of the outermost frames need to be repainted. ', 'SR': 'Bug 18705Too much flashin in Control Examplerun the control example resize the window intheverticaldirectiononly notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash. '}
